General.Name: Nanning Baling Technology
General.Description: Nanning Baling Technology Co., Ltd. operates in automotive industry in Mainland China. It offers radiators, battery heat exchangers, intercoolers, oil coolers, condensers, heaters, and condensers; and exterior products, such as bumpers, tailgates, side panels, top covers, headlight covers, fenders, spoilers, and lower trim panels. The company also provides automotive thermal management solutions. Its products are used in traditional energy vehicles, new energy vehicles, construction machinery and other fields. Nanning Baling Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Nanning, China.
